description: This file implements a class WECB providing various methods to interact with a component using the RDK Management framework, including parameter retrieval, setting, attribute manipulation, object table management, and session handling. It appears to be part of a larger system with functions for registration, initialization, and cleanup, and includes external linkage functions for object creation and destruction.

classes.name: WECB
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with the RDK-based component for parameter management, object handling, and session control.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the WECB component; registers wrapper methods with the agent.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Sets up prerequisites by registering the component with the CR.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Resets prerequisites and unregisters the component from the CR.

methods.name: void WECB_GetParamNames(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves list of parameters associated with a namespace.

methods.name: void WECB_GetParamValues(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves values of a specified parameter.

methods.name: void WECB_GetParamAttributes(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves attributes of a specified parameter.

methods.name: void WECB_SetParamValues(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets a new value for a specified parameter.

methods.name: void WECB_SetParamAttribute(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets attributes for a specified parameter.

methods.name: void WECB_SetSessionId(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the session ID for the component.

methods.name: void WECB_AddObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Adds an entry to a table object.

methods.name: void WECB_DelObject(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Deletes an entry from a table object.

methods.name: void WECB_SetCommit(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)

ctags.name: WECB_AddObject
ctags.pattern: /^void WECB::WECB_AddObject(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& response)$/

ctags.pattern: /^void WECB::WECB_DelObject(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& response)$/
